highlights.name: Geminid Meteor Shower
highlights.description: One of the best meteor showers of the year. Up to 150 multicolored meteors per hour. Best viewing after midnight.

highlights.name: Ursid Meteor Shower
highlights.description: Minor shower with 5-10 meteors per hour. Peaks on the winter solstice.

highlights.name: Jupiter
highlights.description: Bright and visible most of the night in Taurus. Look for its four largest moons with binoculars.

highlights.name: Saturn
highlights.description: Visible in the evening sky in Aquarius. Sets around midnight.

highlights.name: Venus
highlights.description: Brilliant evening star in the west after sunset. Unmistakably bright.
